sentences.sContent: They stand guard with weapons as the human survivors of the battle are marched onto the shuttle.
sentences.sContent_eng: They stand guard with weapons as the human survivors of the battle are marched onto the shuttle.
sentences.sCn: 他们站在一起用武器护卫着战后的人类幸存者鱼贯进入航天飞机。

sentences.sContent: Simultaneously, a mysterious piece of debris flew high into the air near the shuttle, apparently from the flame trench.
sentences.sContent_eng: Simultaneously, a mysterious piece of debris flew high into the air near the shuttle, apparently from the flame trench.
sentences.sCn: 同时，一个未知的碎片在太空梭附近飞向天空，显然这个碎片是来自下方的火焰的。

sentences.sContent: ...The technologically compromised space shuttle program has just come to an end...

synos.tran: [航]航天飞机；穿梭；[纺]梭子；穿梭班机、公共汽车等

phrases.pCn: 航天飞机（往返于地球和太空站之间运载人和物资的）
班车（在较短距离之间往返的交通车）；豪华轿车
n. 短程运输；往返大巴服务；区间飞航
穿梭式矿车；梭车；往返架车

remMethod.val: shut(关) ＋ tle → 封闭的空间 → 航天飞机
